website_summaries.verdict: Extremely stylish media storage cabinet with glass doors and 5 adjustable shelves.
pros: Dimensions of 44 by 22 inches with adjustable shelves
Set up your media storage exactly how you want
Cabinet has an antique walnut finish
Goes well in any location in your home
Glass doors in the storage unit give it a more stylish look than an open shelving unit
cons: Some parts don't fit together easily during the long assembly process

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to hold a wine glass collection and its perfect. The tempered glass doors are clear so you can see what is in the cabinet. Easy to put together, but took about 45 minutes for one person. I secured it to the wall because it's a bit light weight and I have glass in it. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: camper girl

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I If you could give a product negative stars I would. After unpacking all of the parts for assembly and spending an hour assembling this cabinet and cleaning up all of the packaging, I discovered that all of the included shelves were about one half inch too short. Not a single one of the shelves were wide enough to sit on top of the adjustable side pegs. If I even touched the shelf much less put anything on them they would all fall to the bottom of the cabinet. Very poorly made and a complete waste of time and money. I’ve already thrown it in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: TWinDallas

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable quality
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet arrived and I assembled it. Solid wood, just as advertised, but something went wrong in manufacture. The divider in each door had a visible gap and the doors did not meet, there was a tapered gap of 1/4 inch to 1/2 inch and worst of all, the shelves were too short to span between the pins in the cabinet sides. I could not keep the shelves in place. The only fix would be to makes the shelves longer or remanufacture the cabinet case to bring the top and bottom mounts closer to each other. Manufacturer needs to implement quality control measures, as the design is good and the materials are good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boutros

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Wood CD/DVD Cabinet with Glass Doors, Antique Walnut
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lovely media cabinet, takes up surprisingly little space, and is sturdy. But, I must admit that I'm a little disappointed in one area. The product information states that this item holds about 135 DVDs, but I've found from my own experience that it holds about forty less than that. In hindsight, I probably would've bought a different cabinet had I known it holds significantly less DVDs than advertised. I would still recommend this cabinet, but you might want to take that into account if you have a large collection you want to store and display.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: doors do not fit properly, off set from one another. shelves don’t fit at all too short. So you wind up with nothing but a four sided box Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Parts are defective.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but one door does not sit flush with the other door at the bottom. The shelves are too short and don't sit in the metal shelf dowels properly and wobble....the shelves fall at the slightest touch and won't support DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Product. No assembly instructions, no way to request new copy. Website requires information not included on box in order to submit request. Very difficult for me to return due to size and weight of parts. Worst Amazon purchase in 20+ years of being a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the pic. Different colored pieces.
customer_reviews.text: This looks NOTHING like the pictures. It looks mahogany. I am SO aNGRY. I ordered two. Def can’t even life these let alone put them in my two seater to return. Now I have a headache of the hassle of returning them. How about posting pictures of the actual color. It’s not minor bit off. It’s wayyyyyy darker and matches nothing in my house. UPDATE: ordered a second one and the panels are different colors. Complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Biggest waste of my money in years
customer_reviews.text: This item is horrible and the biggest waste of money I have experienced in years. The side board was split down the side. The doors hung crooked and looked like a cheap piece of junk. The drilled holes did not line up properly. The back board was too big and hung over the sides. Once assembled, it kept wanting to fall backwards. The shelf is so much smaller than what it looks like in the pictures. The box was way to heavy for me to move so it was impossible for me to carry down a flight of stairs and back to a UPS office for return.
customer_reviews.author: Khat

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this item at all but it is put together ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this item at all but it is put together and of course the box is ruined and to take it apart and try to send it back it nearlly impossible. it is very cheaply made and does not stand well on a carpet and the door's have to be closed at the same time. Very hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: voidedmoon

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Engineered
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit together well with doors not closing with out hitting each other. Doors fit to tight. Finished scuffed on doors. CNC hole drilling is off causing this. So now the pain staking ordeal of disassembly and return. These type of products are usually a no brainier to to assemble but this one is a disappointment. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: it was a little expensive compared to similar items but I like it very much. If it was a little cheaper I probably would have gotten a second one. I like the finish on it. I have a lot of items from this company and I like it because they always use real wood and the finish is pretty consistent so my items look like they all go together. They dont use particle board and other than in places that dont show. Its a very nice piece. I do wish it were a little taller but it still holds a lot of movies.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very deceiving. The doors are sturdy alone but when it's all put together, once you open it, they fly open and if you lift up on the door by accident, they come off. The doors do not completely meet in the middle. When putting it together, the material is not labeled. Trying to put it together was easy once I figured out which piece was what. The shelves or flimsy once placed inside, I wouldn't trust breakable items in there. On a positive note, the material is a warm color. It arrived fast and in good condition. The hardware was easy to find and screw in.
customer_reviews.author: nrock4

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these and each time I have had to make a modification to make it work. The first time there were 2 holes missing I had to add and the second the hinges were off slightly making it close improperly and it is not flat on bottom piece so I had to put something on bottom to keep it from rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because I couldn't find one locally.
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a CD cabinet I had purchased from a catalog many years ago, which my cats eventually destroyed. I couldn't find a cabinet for my CDs anywhere locally. Every store I went to and asked a sales clerk for one ended up with the clerk looking at me as if I was from another planet. One jerk even said, "You still have CDs?". "Yes, as a matter of fact - I do!". It was a little tough to put together (you really need a drill motor to pre-drill some screw holes) but I managed to do it and it works just fine. It looks nice in my living room and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Wymore

customer_reviews.title: Good value well
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and delivered on time. Was not very difficult to assemble. Was finished in 45 minutes. I had to adjust a hinge, but other than that, good. Wood and not MDF small cabinet to hold my CD collection in my office. Not 5 stars due to the adjustment on the left front door. A novice would be stuck on the door not closing flush. I have put furniture together for far too long!
customer_reviews.author: Ronbo

customer_reviews.title: Generally nice for the pice.
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to put together with reasonable skills. Everything should fit better than it does. They have now raised the price 43% to $150 from $106. Not worth $150. Looks nice, however.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Westover

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with item.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with this item. The item did not come with all the necessary screws and none of the nails to finish assembly. Then once purchased the proper screws the completed item was not very sturdy and was not as nice of quality as I hoped for. While not terribly expensive, still don’t feel the item was quite worth the price paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: I’m not handy and I got it together perfectly in two hours
customer_reviews.text: It’s lovely. My dog knocked over my old rack and eat CD cases! I was in an emergency state. She is a retired greyhound names Winsome! Saw the cabinet on Amazon and ordered it hoping I could assemble. It was not difficult. My pup and I are both very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Polly McFadden

customer_reviews.title: The entertainmnet center doesnt hold as many dvd/bluerays as stated
customer_reviews.text: The unit was easy to put together, but it doesn't hold as many dvds as stated on the web site. Aalso after opening the box I found the unit had a big scratch on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Can't Cancel this, didn't want it.
customer_reviews.text: This got ordered *by mistake* with a DVD Cabinet I ordered as a 'pair'. Tried to cancel it but if you order something as a 'pair' you can't cancel it without cancelling the item you do want. I spoke with Amazon on the phone several times. I cannot get this portion of my order cancelled. Buying a DVD Cabinet with Amazon has turned into a nightmare. I don't want this.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation of products
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the end of August finally found somebody to put it together for me today (12/28/19). Open the box and it’s half the size that I expected. Pictures of item show exagerrated views leading to wrong purchases. Now I am stuck with a shelf I cannot use it or return because of the weight, size and amazon conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: overall nice
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why others are giving such a negative review about the alignment of hardware holes, they were perfect. The stability was exceptional, the only reason for instability maybe due to it sitting on carpet. The color description is the only deception, it claims "walnut", maybe I have a misunderstanding of the color, but it's more of a deep cherry red color. Other than that it looks great and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them although they did come with a couple of flaws on both of the cabinets. One had a small scratch on the front towards the bottom. The other one had needed to have some wood glue. I kept them both, because I was able to fix the defects due to them being at the bottom of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very very small although dimensions were included. The front door, one is not aligned and doesn’t close properly. The safety stickers on the wood paneling peeled off the wood. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Great little curio cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was relatively easy to put together and the parts are made well. It's a perfect size for my knick knacks too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for storage but wouldn't want to open and close doors every day. it every day.
customer_reviews.text: Everything went smooth during assembly but one of the doors was warped just enough to make it right on the hinges. No way to adjust it without messing up the other door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Cabinet held all of my Dvd's and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it dresses up the area that you put it in and held all of my Dvd's . It also was easy to put together and very sturdy. I did not like that the front doors didn't line up properly and catch a little when opening and closing. They give you 4 bolts for securing the top and only have 2 holes pre drilled. But overall we are quite happy with the purchase and would highly recommend it to others. Basically the same cabinet was $100.00 more at Wayfair.
customer_reviews.author: Arvy A Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy this to use as a media cabinet. I bought it to use in my bathroom for toiletries. It's not too big and works great. Finish is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Issue with Hinge
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet was easy to put together all & all, BUT Left Door Lower Hinge was slightly bent and had rough post to go into hinge and I had to sand it off for the hinge to open and close right. I did not want to have to send it back due to size and weight. It was for my wife and I did not want her to have to wait for for a new one to come that might be even worse than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Door alignment
customer_reviews.text: Door alignment is a issue on these cabinets however they are very attractive and at this price point worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction, size
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Excellent construction, sturdy and was very easy to put together with great instructions. It also holds all our DVD's CD's and even some books with proper placement of the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Vendor NOT recommended
customer_reviews.text: Base was severely scratched even though box was not damaged! No instructions for assembly! Wood was acceptable but not worth the cost! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: PGD

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and well made. This was so easy to assemble and it really looks good. Better than I expected so I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Frank McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and sturdy, but difficult to assemble. READ THE DIMENSION CAREFULLY. This is a lot smaller than I anticipated. Good for CDs. Not so much for DVD collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Nothing labeled!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing was labeled....the Instructions had letters for each part but none of the parts were labeled! Very frustrating to out together
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to sit next to my 52 inch LCD entertainment system. It looks very sharp. No complaints there. The design is very poor. The door won't shut all of the way because the hinge is not set in the correct place. When the doors are shut, there is a gap between them. The shelving arrangement is complicated because in the center of the back wall there is a support beam that doesn't allow the doors to shut if DVD's sit on that shelf. I have worked around it by repositioning the shelves but it is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Electronic Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Despite what others have said about quality and difficulty of assembly, I find that the overall quality of the cabinet is very good and assembly was relatively easy. Others have commented on poor alignment of the doors (i.e., knobs out of kilter); such is not the case with my cabinet. I give the cabinet four stars instead of five, because overall quality is shy of "excellent".
customer_reviews.author: James H. Haight

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet but Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I got this and it is smaller than it looks in the pictures, it does have the dimensions in the description, but I guess I overlooked that part. All in all this is a good DVD cabinet. I'd say it holds 20-30 DVDs per shelf. Mine kinda leaned forward so I had to put some cardboard under the front to get it vertical, but that may just be because I have it right up against my baseboard.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but still a great item and wood quality is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Item is a little bit smaller than expected (shorter than imagined), however, the wood quality is GREAT!! It is still perfect for video games, movies, etc. Just beware Amazon ships it in it's box, but the box arrived in perfect condition and the item was not damaged at all. UPS seemed to be gentle with the process.
customer_reviews.author: Staci L. Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed and holds lots of videos or CDS for the space. TWCL
customer_reviews.author: TWCL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Very well satisfied. The DVDs could not fit in the top due to the magnet closure. I placed all of the DVDs in CD skin cases. Works great can fit way more in it. Good quality. Arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. John I. Ghawaly

customer_reviews.title: Dvd cabinet small scale
customer_reviews.text: I needed a dvd cabinet to go in a small space this one fit the bill. I think its a nice looking cabinet good details and holds quite a bit. I only gave it 4 stars because it was missing 2 holes my husband had to drill them himself. Very easy to put together, not many pieces like some of the other prefab furniture where you have 15 pieces to make the top. This one came well packed only 7 pieces to put together, quick shipping as always from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is nicer than I thought it would be, good colour . The only thing is that 1 side is slightly warped (doesn't hamper the door opening or closing) but otherwise a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was easy to assemble and looks great. I am using it to store apothecary-style bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Greenstone

customer_reviews.title: it is smaller than is shows on describtions and doors dont close completely
customer_reviews.text: it is smaller than it describes, and it does not close completely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My only criticism is that it isn’t as big as I thought. Maybe I misread the measurement. Love it other than that.
customer_reviews.author: POETT46

customer_reviews.title: Real wood! Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Fast shipping. The pre drilled holes for the shelf pegs -a few of them were a bit to small, but was able to drill it a little bigger for the shelf peg to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Decent build but watch out for the dimensions, it's very small
customer_reviews.text: It's deceptively small and the setup instructions were not very good. It's a decent build but the doors are a bit of an issue to get to close properly. Overall I'd say this is OK but not the best value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Expected Too Much
customer_reviews.text: I like the cabinet okay; however, I don't love it. It is easy to assemble and looks fine, but it looks exactly like what it is: a piece of furniture that I put together~no frills or fine touches. The biggest problem I have with it is that the shelves don't fit tightly against the sides. The gap created means that CD's/DVD's may fall through, not to mention that it is unsightly. I'm not going to use it for media storage as planned unless I brainstorm a way to fix the gap between the shelves and the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Storian Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Color confusion
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased...the color of the second one is significantly darker-looks more like expresso than walnut
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: One of the panel came warped, wouldn’t assemble. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: NSICE
customer_reviews.text: THE MAGNETS ARE NOT STRONG ENOUGH TO KEEP THE DOORS CLOSED
customer_reviews.author: B STONE

customer_reviews.title: Doors
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these once they were put together the doors won’t close all the way. They are a beautiful piece of furniture just wish the doors would close correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Willhoite

customer_reviews.title: Dvd/cd Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with my cabinet and may buy a 2nd one. The only real problem was that we got 2 right doors so my husband had to redo the hardware on one to make it a left door. Also the screws didn't match up with the holes so we had to force them but all in all I am happy with it, it's what I expected and had read the other reviews so knew what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say about this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time without incident, all parts were included. No damage to any of the parts, everythings was wrapped and protected in the box well. Product is easy to assemble and very bice. In fact, I liked this so much it was a reorder because our dvd collection has grown so much. Recommend this cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Doors operate fine. Pkg
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction. Color more red than walnut. Actually closer to a cherry stain. Appealing door front design. Doors operate fine. Pkg. excellent. Instructions ok.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased to see that nothing was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cabinet and was very excited for my purchase. When I received it, I was pleased to see that nothing was damaged. Once I started to put it together I noticed some of the premade holes were either small or not placed properly. After about an hour of putting it together, I was extremely displeased with the width and height of this cabinet. It is however a very beautiful cabinet but not what it is perceived to be.
customer_reviews.author: basedsaint

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cabinet with a slight cherry wood finish. Would have given it 5 stars but I'm not into the cherry wood finish.
customer_reviews.author: Lees

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why it is so expensive
customer_reviews.text: So this product literally is just ok. I like the color and it fits my needs. However, I am having a really hard time understanding the price on this item. As other reviews suggest the doors are not flush and doesn't close as nicely as I think it should. All in all - I wouldn't go back and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The doors don't line up or shut correctly. The side is not stained totally (missing stain) possibly gouged. The stickers on the glass don't peel off easily and leave residue. I would expect to pay 50 maybe 60 for this product. I'm very disappointed. I thought paying as much as we did that the quality would have been much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Mini-cabinet. Poorly made. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small. Looks like item for a playhouse. Not put together well. Doors won't close because will not line up. Gap in top.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Phelps

customer_reviews.title: it 3 foot tall shelves are uneven
customer_reviews.text: its not worth the money ur kid could make one for less than 20. I'm only 5 foot tall and the shelf is below my chest
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bench

customer_reviews.title: As specified.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and the measurements were as stated. I had a specific space it had to fit into. It is not top of the line furniture, but decent and affordable. It provides a nice looking display cabinet for our collection of reproductions of antique books and keeps them free of dust. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs. Wickersham

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it did not come with the correct screws for the door knobs, they were too short and I wasn't able to screw the knobs onto the door. Don't be like me and destroy the packaging when opening it up because you will probably need it to return this poorly designed cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to put my dvd's in. I got it because it has doors and I keep a child safety lock on the knobs to keep my toddlers out of the dvd's! It was easy to put together, took about 15 minutes. Looks nice. Don't know how many it holds but I've got it stuffed to the max at least 150. Will be getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: TaliaDenae

customer_reviews.title: Price much bigger that its worth.
customer_reviews.text: Very weak and fragile can't trust to put anything into it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Kafrouny

customer_reviews.title: STEAL A DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for a very low price. That is a STEAL! Assembled the parts easily in just 30 minutes! It looks expensive to me. Nice looking! LOVE IT! Highly recommend this item to everyone for the solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Taccetta

customer_reviews.title: nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: actually a well built cabinet, doors open and close easily, stores a lot of DVDs without taking up a lot of room
customer_reviews.author: Liz H.

customer_reviews.title: good looking all wood cabinet
customer_reviews.text: cabinet looks great when assembled. holds approximately 200 cd's,but not lined up on the shelves. Some had to be stacked on top of the rows of cd's. The cabinet is tall and narrow,maybe not suitable for some applications,but it fit perfectly in the space I had available. everything went together well except the back(a thin piece of folded laminate). most of the pre-drilled holes were in the wrong place but it wasn't a lot of trouble to re-drill them and this doesn't show because it is on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence White

customer_reviews.title: Its really nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, but should have really checked the measurements closer. Way smaller than i thought it would be, but it looks good
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my intended use. My 16yr old grandson assembled it for me. He said it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Miller

customer_reviews.title: Used to organize tablets, HP book. Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Used cabinet for storing my tablet devises. Added battery LED lights on each shelf. Large tablet and HP Chrome units angled and added self-adhesive stops to fit with doors closed.
customer_reviews.author: "Edward Z" in Maryland!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small living rooms
customer_reviews.text: It was a little wobbly when assembled but what a great price and it looks gorgeous so I'm not complaining about a very slight wobble! Nothing inside is falling over so I'm super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justo Garza

customer_reviews.title: Attractive piece of furniture but major flaws
customer_reviews.text: Even though I read all the reviews first regarding the support brace and the door to magnet line up I decided to take my chances. I should have listened. These are two very important design flaws, I wish the manufacturer would take these issues into consideration before making another cabinet. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful detail.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Will free up so much space. Beautiful detail. One scratch on top near back but I have a wood cover up marker in same color.
customer_reviews.author: andielea

customer_reviews.title: CD/DVD Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this cabinet, tho' it does not hold as much as we had anticipated. It went together without any problems. The one thing I don't like is the top shelf, it does not have enough space for CD's to be in an upright position, you have to lay them down. We have it in our living room and it looks very nice. Lover of Classical Music
customer_reviews.author: Grandma M

customer_reviews.title: DVD Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a really nice DVD Cabinet. It looks great in the living room and holds several movies. I was almost able to consolidate two DVD racks. The cabinet arrived with a bend hinge which causes one of the doors to need a little extra nudge to close completely. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet looks good, but I could not get the doors to close all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits well, and assembly was easy. The finished product looks good and sits firmly on the floor. No problem of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Scientist

customer_reviews.title: really pretty piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. My son put it together for me and said that was a bit of a challenge since there were only pictures and no words, but, he managed and it is really, really pretty. Seems sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Just a little to small
customer_reviews.text: The unit was smaller then I thought it would be and viewing the bottom row of stored CDs is not easy. The assembly was actually very easy and it only required about forty five minutes to have it CD ready, and the unit is quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L Mills

customer_reviews.title: Good looking cabinet at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and holds all our dvd’s. Exactly as described. Glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Annie

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cabinet, the only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because on the top shelf in the center top where the magnet for the door is installed, it takes away valuable storage space for several DVD's on center of the top shelf.

customer_reviews.title: its nice enough. The shelves are removable
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot nicer then I expected. I actually use mine as nicer bookshelf in my room. You can also use this as a mini curio, its nice enough. The shelves are removable, and adjustable, so you can move them around.

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase of this product is inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this product in less than two weeks. This one was the second and was not near as good quality as the first one. The color was noticeably darker, the quality was inferior (staining and construction), shelf pegs do not stay in, the glass is loose in the door. Surprising because the first one we received was really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Schmidt

product_meta.title: Winsome Wood Holden Media/Entertainment, Antique Walnut
product_meta.description:
Elegantly styled with traditional profiled trim and deep stain. 5 adjustable shelves offer storage for up to 135 DVDs, 205 CDs or 75 videocassettes. With glass door inserts and satin nickel-finish metal hardware. Warm walnut finish.

AMAZON.COM
The family entertainment area can look just as handsome as the rest of the house with the help Winsome Wood's CD/DVD cabinet. Featuring a stained Antique Walnut wood finish and double glass doors, this classically styled unit presents itself as an attractive furniture piece rather than simple storage. Yet it's really a hard worker--inside, five adjustable shelves safely and efficiently hold large collections of movies, video games, and music. Simply pull the satin nickel door handles and everything is displayed with no need to shuffle through or dig in the back for a long-lost favorite. The cabinet measures 22 inches wide by 9-1/4 inches deep by 44-1/4 inches high. Assembly is required. --Kara Karll
feature_bullets: Overall cabinet size is 22" Wide x 9. 2" Deep x 44" High.
Double wood trim glass doors with four adjustable shelves.
Made with combination of solid and composite wood in walnut Finish. Assembly required.
